text: "Hot Shower" is a song by American rapper Chance the Rapper featuring American rappers MadeinTYO and DaBaby. It is the second single from Chance's debut studio album The Big Day (2019), and was produced by Smoko Ono. == Live performances == Chance the Rapper performed the song on Saturday Night Live in October 2019. == Music video == The music video was released alongside the single on October 28, 2019. It was directed by Reel Goats, who have directed many of DaBaby's music videos. The visual plays out a reference to the film Good Burger in the song. Jake Johnson and Kel Mitchell make cameos in the video. == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! Chart (2019) !
